name: BearsFan
0:
”Alexa, open Bears fan.”
”Alexa, ask Bears fan for a flash briefing on the Bears.”
”Alexa, ask Bears fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bears fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Bears by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Bears.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Bears Fan how are the Bears doing? 

Alexa, ask Bears Fan who do the Bears play next?

Alexa, ask Bears Fan Jordan Howard (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Bears:


Alexa, ask Bears Fan to tell me some trivia about the Bears. 

Alexa, ask Bears Fan how many Super Bowls have the Bears won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
